help_main_description:
A music bot for Discord.

Check out the commands below!
help_general_description:
`/invite` - Invite bot to other servers
`/coffee` - Support TAPI
`/setting [Option]` - Configure bot settings (Admin)
　`channel` - Set/unset bot-only channel
　`autodel` - Toggle auto-delete messages
　`instant_disconnect` - Toggle instant/delayed disconnect
help_music_description:
**Playback**
`/play [song/link/playlist]` - Play music (YouTube, Spotify)
`/spplay [song/link]` - Search and play from Spotify
`/scplay [song/link]` - Search and play from SoundCloud
`/search [keyword]` - Search and select songs
*(Pause, skip, etc. are controlled via buttons during playback)*

**Queue & Volume**
`/volume [1-100]` - Adjust volume
`/queue` - View queue
`/remove [number]` - Remove song from queue
`/clear` - Clear entire queue
*(Shuffle and repeat are controlled via buttons during playback)*

**More**
`/nowplaying` - Current song info

**Playlists**
`/save` - Save current queue as your playlist
`/load` - Load your saved playlist
welcome_description: Try `/help` to see what I can do!
music_input_over_vol: :loud_sound: | Volume has to be between 1% and 100%!
music_remove_input_over: There are only tracks from 1 to {last_queue}!
music_recommend_youtube_only: Recommendations only work with YouTube tracks!
music_recommend_not_found: Couldn't find any recommendations. Try again later!
music_recommend_all_added_description:
Based on **{track_title}**
{count} tracks added to queue.
music_dc_not_connect_voice_channel: I'm not in a voice channel!
music_not_connected_voice_channel: :warning: | I'm not in a voice channel!
music_no_permission: :warning: | I need Connect and Speak permissions!
music_come_in_my_voice_channel: :warning: | You're in a different channel! Come join mine.
other_invite_description: Click [here]({link}) to add TAPI to your server!
music_auto_disconnect_log: Bot automatically left voice channel in guild '{guild_name}' (no users in channel)
vote_description: Enjoying TAPI? Consider voting or leaving a review!
vote_required_description:
Please vote for TAPI to get started!
You only need to vote once.
coffee_description: Your support helps keep TAPI running!
playlist_save_empty: Nothing to save! Play some music first.
playlist_save_error: Couldn't save the playlist. Try again!
playlist_save_truncated: Only the first {max} tracks were saved (beta limit).
playlist_load_failed: Couldn't load any tracks from this playlist.
playlist_not_found:
No saved playlist yet!
Use `/save` while music is playing to create one.
music_queue_full_partial: Only {added} of {total} tracks were added (queue limit: {max})
channel_set_description:
{channel} has been set as the bot-only channel.
Slash commands can only be used here.
channel_unset_description:
The bot-only channel setting for {channel} has been removed.
Commands can now be used in any channel.
channel_restrict_message: ⚠️ Bot commands can only be used in {channel}.
setting_desc: Configure the bot's behavior for this server.
setting_autodel_desc: Set whether the bot should automatically delete its messages.
setting_autodel_result_off: Auto-delete is now **OFF**. (Messages will not be deleted)
setting_instant_disconnect_result_on: Instant disconnect is now **ON**. (Leaves immediately when queue ends)
setting_instant_disconnect_result_off: Delayed disconnect is now **ON**. (Waits 30 seconds before leaving)
